attributes.action: review the legislation on age discrimination because it isn't working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Potential employers continue to ask age-discriminatory questions in interviews and can reject applications saying ridiculous things like 'you are over qualified' when what they actually mean is 'we don't want someone your age'. The Job Centres know this and do nothing about it, even when the employer in question is a public body such as a local council
